snippet: The State Department will allow President Raúl Castro’s daughter to travel to Philadelphia to receive a gay civil rights award.
abstract: State Department will allow Mariela Castro, daughter of Pres Raul Castro, to travel to Philadelphia to receive a gay civil rights award, lifting earlier restriction.
lead_paragraph: The State Department will allow President Raúl Castro’s daughter to travel to Philadelphia to receive a gay civil rights award.

headline.main: Cuba: U.S. Allows President’s Daughter to Travel
headline.print_headline: Cuba: U.S. Allows President’s Daughter to Travel
